name: Distorsion (Impact_Micro_Game)
description:
Distortion is a Horror/Puzzle game where you play as a little girl trapped between her dismansion and the monster. The goal is to escape by completing the puzzles. Will you manage to escape? 

The game was made for a GameJam of 1 day, then refined during 1 month.

The monster is my realization in addition to the code.
